titles.title: A resolution designating the week beginning October 5, 2008, as "National Sudden Cardiac Arrest Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 4/24/2008--Introduced. Designates the week beginning October 5, 2008, as National Sudden Cardiac Arrest Awareness Week. Expresses support for efforts to educate people about sudden cardiac arrest and to raise awareness about the risk of sudden cardiac arrest, identifying warning signs, and the need to seek medical attention in a timely manner.
